attributes.name: Uses large muscles for movement
attributes.categoryInformation: Gross motor skills including running, jumping, climbing

progressionPoints.title: Emerging
progressionPoints.description: Shows beginning awareness and attempts at large muscle movement

progressionPoints.title: Developing
progressionPoints.description: Demonstrates increasing control and coordination of large muscles

progressionPoints.title: Secure
progressionPoints.description: Shows confident and coordinated use of large muscles

attributes.name: Uses small muscles for precise movements
attributes.categoryInformation: Fine motor skills including writing, drawing, manipulating objects

progressionPoints.title: Emerging
progressionPoints.description: Shows beginning attempts at precise movements with small muscles

progressionPoints.title: Developing
progressionPoints.description: Demonstrates increasing precision and control of small muscles

progressionPoints.title: Secure
progressionPoints.description: Shows confident and precise use of small muscles

attributes.name: Shows self-awareness and confidence
attributes.categoryInformation: Understanding of self and personal capabilities

progressionPoints.title: Emerging
progressionPoints.description: Shows beginning awareness of self and personal abilities

progressionPoints.title: Developing
progressionPoints.description: Demonstrates growing self-awareness and confidence in abilities

progressionPoints.title: Secure
progressionPoints.description: Shows strong self-awareness and confidence in various situations
